main.name: Godstime .O. Agho
main.description: I am a Web Development Engineer and I use React for frontend, Nodejs/Express for backend, mongodb, postgresql & firebase to manage your database with top-notch security. This project is my profile that can be shared, and used, but don't forget to reference us.
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Give me a call and let me help you shoot your business to the world and help you create that visibility and credibilty you have long been looking for.
